articles.title: Polyshine Solar Shines at SNEC 2025 with Five Application- Specific Solutions
articles.description: SHANGHAI, June 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The global PV and energy storage industry event, 2025 SNEC PV&ES was held in Shanghai, China. As an innovative leader in the field of lightweight PV modules, Polyshine Solar brings five application-specific solutions, enabling global industry professionals offered by lightweight PV Technology. New product debut: JG-Series Lightweight and flexible is the result of Polyshine solar's market research. Over the past few years, We have focused on solving application for low- load and curved surfaces. However, our observations reveal that "lightweight" is the core demand for most application scenarios. The JG-Series lightweight module utilizes a 1.1mm ultra-thin glass package, reducing weight by over 50% compared to traditional modules. With a module conversion efficiency of up to 23.3%, it provides a more cost-effective lightweight solution for a wider range of rooftops. Five Application-Specific Solutions Scenario 1: High Energy Consumption Plant Polyshine Solar's lightweight innovative solution addresses common challenges in traditional high energy-consumption plants, such as insufficient load-bearing capacity and curved structures. Weighing less than 5.5 kg/sqm, it significantly reduces roof pressure. With a 0.5m bending radius, it conforms to curved surfaces. Furthermore, its self-cleaning coating reduces PV plant maintenance, lowering operational costs and increasing revenue. Scenario2: Traffic Sound Barrier Noise Noise reduction, power generation, lightweight, safety! Polyshine Solar's traffic photovoltaic solution is designed for elevated roads. Using ultra-lightweight and safe materials, it combines noise reduction with high-efficiency power generation. This transforms road sound barriers from basic infrastructure into revenue generators! Scenario 3: Harbor Art Museums Art museums by the sea demand unique aesthetics, while the hot and humid coastal climate presents an extreme challenge for photovoltaic modules! Polyshine Solar's customizable color module solution meets the aesthetic requirements of landmark buildings. Our patented encapsulation technology reliably withstands harsh seaside environments. Scenario 4: Flower Market Polyshine Solar's double-sided translucent, lightweight, and flexible PV modules feature customizable light transmittance. Generating power on both sides to capture solar energy, they simultaneously provide optimal lighting conditions for crop growth. Scenario5: Balcony PV Struggling with difficult installation and high labor costs for residential PV solutions? Polyshine solar's balcony-specific PV module are designed for easy installation: simply secure them using cable ties. A single module can be installed by one person in just two minutes. They adapt to various balcony and garden railing, making it easy to start generating solar income. "Where light exists, there is Polyshine! "

articles.title: Hizb-ut-Tahrir Bhopal Case: NIA Launches Multi-State Raids To Expose Radical Recruitment And Terror Plots
creator: IANS
articles.description: In a crackdown on radical networks, the National Investigation Agency (NIA) on Saturday carried out searches at multiple locations in Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan in connection with the Hizb-ut-Tahrir (HuT) terror conspiracy case, the probe agency‚Äôs statement said.The raids were conducted at three premises in Bhopal and two in Jhalawar, Rajasthan, as part of the agency‚Äôs investigation into the case, also known as the HuT Bhopal case.The searches aimed to gather further evidence on the activities of members of the banned outfit.According to the NIA, several digital devices and other incriminating materials were seized during the operations.‚ÄúThese items will undergo detailed forensic examination to aid in the ongoing investigation,‚Äù NIA said.The case pertains to a larger conspiracy by Hizb-ut-Tahrir to radicalise and recruit vulnerable Muslim youth across India.The recruits were allegedly being indoctrinated with extremist ideology and motivated to resort to violence to topple the country‚Äôs democratically elected government and establish a state governed by Shariah law, NIA said.The NIA has reiterated its commitment to dismantling terrorist and radical networks operating in India.Investigations in the case are ongoing, with further action expected in the coming days.Hizb ut-Tahrir, founded in 1953 in Jerusalem, is a global pan-Islamic Salafi movement. Its Palestinian branch includes hundreds of members in the West Bank. Their organisation has recently been limited to activities of supporters among students in universities.The organisation sees world history as an eternal conflict between Islam and non-believers, with the state system considered a historical assault on Islam.The group views Jihad as an essential aspect of its vision and considers it an imperative duty aimed at combating disbelief until all submit to Islamic rule.NIA Conducts Searches in M.P. & Rajasthan in Hizb-Ut-Tahrir Terror Conspiracy Case pic.twitter.com/GQmA0tba4j‚Äî NIA India (@NIA_India) June 14, 2025(This report has been published as part of the auto-generated syndicate wire feed. Apart from the headline, no editing has been done in the copy by ABP Live.)

articles.title: Glion x Vincent Smadja: A Dreamlike Artwork Capturing the Essence of Luxury and Exceptional Hospitality
articles.description: To celebrate the success of its portfolio of programs fully dedicated to luxury, Glion Institute of Higher Education unveils an exceptional artistic collaboration with visionary digital artist Vincent Smadja. Together, they bring to life a dreamlike piece, a true celebration of beauty, excellence, and well-being, where luxury and hospitality are a spectacle‚Äîan experience to be lived and felt.The artwork is now live and available to discover on Glion‚Äôs official social media platforms.A Celebration of Luxury as a Sensory and Emotional ExperienceSet in an enchanting landscape inspired by the Swiss Alps, the birthplace of the institution for over 60 years, a man walks gracefully along a tightrope, like a model on a haute couture runway, above a banquet lit by majestic chandeliers. This suspended moment in time culminates in a burst of sparkles, a flight of light that elevates the scene and pays tribute to the art of evoking emotion.Through this poetic mise-en-sceÃÄne, Glion celebrates the essence of exceptional hospitality, where every gesture, every detail, every consideration becomes a form of art. The piece symbolizes the pursuit of uniqueness, ultra-personalization, and the perfect moment, hallmarks of contemporary luxury. It reflects the belief that hospitality is not a service but an experience, a living art built on generosity, excellence, and beauty.Luxury today is deeply inspired by the codes of high-end hospitality: beyond the obsession with quality lies an acute attention to detail and a commitment to tailor-made experiences. This is precisely the expertise that Glion brings to the luxury houses, training professionals capable of elevating every interaction. This transfer of know-how, between hospitality and the art of living, is at the very heart of Glion‚Äôs DNA.A Work by Vincent Smadja, Artist of Emotional IntelligenceTo embody this vision, Glion turned to Vincent Smadja, creator of the ‚ÄúIf Only‚Äù project, which explores the imaginary through the infinite potential of artificial intelligence. A former event manager turned digital artist, his emotional and distinctive style has attracted major global brands‚Äîfrom Maison Valentino and Nike to The Peninsula Paris, Sephora, and Lamborghini.His universe, at the crossroads of dreams and technology, earned him a spot among the top 5 favorite Instagram accounts of Adam Mosseri, CEO of Instagram. Through Midjourney; a technology that goes beyond simple text-to-image conversion to reveal stunningly aesthetic works; he creates magical, hyper-realistic scenes full of emotion and visual storytelling, pushing the boundaries of traditional digital creation:‚ÄúAI allows me to explore concepts that would otherwise remain mere ideas. With this piece, I wanted to express the very essence of luxury and hospitality: a pursuit of excellence and a devotion to the smallest details, capable of transforming any interaction into an unforgettable experience.‚Äù ‚Äì Vincent SmadjaGlion: Bridging Hospitality Excellence and French Art de VivreFor over a decade, Glion has been shaping the future leaders of luxury by instilling in them the values of personalized service, craftsmanship, and emotional engagement. Today, its alumni work in the most prestigious maisons, far beyond hospitality: in fine jewelry, haute couture, automotive, and watchmaking.With a full range of programs in Luxury Management, Bachelor‚Äôs, Master‚Äôs, and Executive Master; Glion affirms more than ever its position as a talent incubator for the luxury world, empowering students to imagine, design, and deliver timeless experiences.
